subject: Inquiry about my order
description_text:
Hi im reaching out about my order, and would like to know if there has been any delays or issues with my order
And when I can expect an update on my order

Here is my details of the order
Order number: #SSN1957
The order item:
Simsonn Pro Plus Pedal Upgrade Hydraulic Pedal Set Black
Plus-P2-H2 / BaseplateChoose two Elastomer: 70HA, 80HA


Best regards

Tim F. Skærlund

conversations.body_text: Hi Fse7en, your address is too remote for us to cover the shipping cost of the product, emailed you 5 days ago and need you to cover part of the shipping cost, can you accept the offer?

Hi thank you for reaching back so quickly, I manage to forget checking my spam folder, I would like to pay the extra fee to cover the shipping.
how will I be able to pay for it?

Best regards

Tim F. Skærlund
________________________________
Hi Fse7en,    Thank you for your understanding,  you can pay by clicking on this link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2
